description: brod lets you produce messages to the Kafka distributed publishsubscribe messaging service. It started as a fork of pykafka (httpsgithub.comdsullypykafka), but became a total rewrite as we needed to add many features.Its named after Max Brod, Fran Kafkas friend and supporter.
longdescription: brod lets you produce messages to the Kafka distributed publishsubscribe messaging service. It started as a fork of pykafka (httpsgithub.comdsullypykafka), but became a total rewrite as we needed to add many features.Its named after Max Brod, Fran Kafkas friend and supporter.
